sentences.en: " George, I let Mary go yesterday, " was not an unfrequent salutation at the dinner table.
sentences.cn: “ 乔治, 我昨天把玛丽打发了. " 这一类谈话在他们家饭桌上经常可以听到.

sentences.en: It was accompanied by a smile and a salutation from the cashier who paid it.
sentences.cn: 发放薪水的出纳员在付钱的同时还对她含笑致意.

sentences.en: KJV The salutation by the hand of me Paul. Remember my bonds.
sentences.cn: [新译]我保罗亲笔问候你们. 你们要记念我的捆锁.愿恩惠与你们同在.

sentences.en: My best salutation are to them - Who know me impertect and love me.
sentences.cn: 我最终的祝福要给那些人,知道我不完美却仍然爱我的人.

sentences.en: Patroni waved his cigar in salutation and honked his horn twice.
sentences.cn: 佩特罗尼挥动雪茄表示敬意,并且按了两下喇叭.

sentences.en: She threw a kiss as a salutation.
The old man moved away, raising his hand in salutation.
sentences.cn: 老人一边举手致意一边走远了。

sentences.en: The salutation and complimentary close are omitted in the block format.
sentences.cn: 在简体格式中,结尾的致谢和致敬语都可以省略.

sentences.en: The salutation of me Paul with mine own hand.
The salutation of the letter said, " Dear John. "
sentences.cn: 那封信上的称呼是 “ 亲爱的约翰 ”.

sentences.en: This was a kind of salutation to the whole assembly.
sentences.cn: 他是在对整个集体打招呼.

sentences.en: Try to avoid the too frequent use of such Latin words as juxtaposition, animadvert, salutation, recapitulate.

sentences.en: When he saw the commissariat, he raised his hand in salutation.
sentences.cn: 他看到政委时举手敬礼.

sentences.en: When he saw the principal, he raised his hand in salutation.
sentences.cn: 他看到校长时举手敬礼.
